title: Northern Pines Apartments Huge 2 bedroom 2bath Coming soon!
posting_body: Inside our apartment homes, we feature an all-electric apartment home, equipped with updated flooring, Black Appliances (in select unit), washer/dryer connections with a separate laundry room and walk in closets in both bedrooms.
We also offer 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, minutes from Northlake Mall, Stone Mountain Park, a variety of eateries, Shopping and Banking and yes, we are cable Ready.
There is a BBQ Grilling area and playground with Beautiful Landscaping and off street parking.
This huge two bedroom; two full bath is 1100 square feet.
Our rental qualifications include making three times the amount of the monthly rent, passing a Criminal, credit, rental and employment background check!
We are open from 9am-5pm on Mondays/Weds/Fridays of each week to service your needs.
*Some Restrictions May Apply and Prices are Subject to Change
